title: God Save the Dork
description: Alternate cover for this ISBN can be found hereGod Save the Dork continues in the style of the first book, a satirical and witty take on the world of corporate consultancy and management. The blunders of the protagonist Robin Varghese highlight the absurdities in corporate life, and the characterâ€™s very mediocrity makes him attractive, despite his pretensions.
author: Sidin Vadukut
